attributes.title: Trump app
attributes.review: Do not vote for trump, I know you guys may think he’s a good guys and everything and protects everyone he DOESNT! On national tv he made fun of the BLM post about a 46 year old man named George Floyd when he said he couldn’t breathe😪. Is this really our PRESIDENT?!? NO stand up for your rights and don’t vote for him, have a blessed day! #BARACK OBAMA IS MY PRESIDENT❤️❤️❤️

attributes.title: THIS IA THE WORST APP EVER
attributes.review:
This is the WORST app
Ever. It took 4 hours to download and when it did download it kept glitching and asking me if I wanted him to build a wall. Do not download the app it’s so bad. And also when it was glitching all I could see something orange it looked like an expired tangerine it was so strange.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: absolutely horrible app, after taking hours to download it couldn’t even stay up without crashing multiple times, a shame that apple even keeps these apps up.

attributes.title: don’t download this app!
attributes.review: this app downloaded on my phone, but took several months to do so. the app started playing the afro circus theme song and downloading viruses into my phone. whenever i tried to open my music app, all i heard was trump’s voice telling me that i was a pig because i was a woman. he also confessed to me that he’s afraid of gen z and millennials because he knows we can overthrow him. (hence the mature content warning on the app). i hope this review helped!

attributes.title: Terrible app.
attributes.review:
All apps matter! 
Also made my phone start glitching really bad and then this 🟠 this kept on showing up and I had to restart my whole phone. 
Save yourself the time and just don’t bother!

attributes.title: give it a bad review😝🥰DUMP TRUMP 2020
attributes.review: awful. worse decision ever to put this on the app store. almost as bad as making trump president. very disappointed😞i’m out of storage now i want a refund🐍🐍so sad. apparently there giving apps to everyone now🤢i lost brain cells using it, like talking angela😢😢dump trump 2020❤️😝

attributes.title: Worst decision of my life
attributes.review: After I got this app I just started to get this urge to be racist I would make racist comments to every minority that I would see but after I deleted the app it magically went away so every should delete this app

This app keeps flashing every time I get on. My baby sister has epilepsy and she had a seizure. If you’re going to have an app that flashes please put a warning. And also I always see a Cheeto on here and it’s kinda confusing why it’s necessary for the app

attributes.title: Yucky
attributes.review: Terrible app! I thought it was a campaign for an orange! Turns out it was a campaign for a clown 🙄 very disappointed, although when he got stuck in a peach it was quite funny, other then that I wouldn’t recommend getting this app!

attributes.title: This app booty
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app made my phone exploded in my face and now all my eyelashes and eyebrows are gone and then a gas came out of my phone probably from the app as well and it attracted bugs that ate up my house no I don’t have a home
